column2: PY-28629: Fix resolving skeletons for implicit relative imports

column3:
@vlasovskikh
I would really like to get this fixed before 2018 release as it is causing a lot of problems in Python 2.7 when dealing with older libraries.
Tests pending... Is there a fixture I can use to setup the test skeletons?
@fitermay. Yes, the WithBinaryModules is a good place for testing skeletons. I've rebased your PR onto master with a couple of fixes. Thanks!
PY-28629: Fix resolving skeletons for implicit relative imports
